EmailTemplate.description: Use this template to respond to tech support requested from customers with expired SMAs
EmailTemplate.name: Customers with Expired SMAs
EmailTemplate.subject: Support Contract Renewal Needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your email. We would be happy to reply to this issue if you could first please renew your support contract by contacting Bernice Holthaus (with our TriTech EMS Accounting Department) at bernice.holthaus@tritech.com or 563-387-4821.
We hope to speak with you soon,
TriTech EMS Support Team
